ToolBarActivity Tabbed_Activity ViewPager ScreenSlideActivity Ca Marche !!!!7 Welcome on MeetUs ! MeetUs is a brain new application that aim for developpers interaction and dialog, using funny games ! First of all, check other user Profile by swiping on the right of this page, and see who they are, learn what they do ! When you\'re ready, swipe again and play Guess. You\'ll be given infos about a random Wilder, and you will see a blurred photo. At the bottom of the page, try to guess who he/she is by typing his name. The closest you answer, the focused will be the picture ! You got\'t five try ! At the end you\ll be given a note on how much you know the people you have been guessing about!
Have fun !
Credits : Mathieu, Marine, Sarah, your MeetUs Team ! ProfilWelcome \"Les Toast c\'est bon\" SignUpActivity Verify your Password Password trop court, 6 caractéres minimum ! Forgot password string Forgot password msg Reset Password Oh I remember now ! GUESS TRY Spécialité Ville Age Wild Side Show me your Wild face !
